Introduction to Global Humanities

Download as PDF

Overview

Subject area

Catalog Number

Course Title

Introduction to Global Humanities

Department(s)

Description

This course will offer a global awareness and understanding of the expansive history of humanity and the diversity of cultural forms and practices. Its aim is to give foundational knowledge from multiple perspectives that describe the chronological and geographical relationships between cultures. This course will also pique studentsâ€™ interest in history, philosophy, literature, social sciences, art, and music. This will encourage the student to reflect on how personal origins and beliefs affect actions and values.
